job_title: English and German Instructor in Istanbul
pros: It's one of the best universities in Russia. The university provides students of different degrees with English lessons. Students are divided into groups according to their current level. They have 1 180-min-lesson once a week. the thing I like about the university is s the freedom and flexibility that we have in using different materials, sources in teaching. A big number of workshops, lectures for teachers
cons: I would doubt the number of lessons per week. I'm sure students need more classes. And the payment could be higher
